law.catch_line: Open season and creel limits for rough fish.

text.section: The open season for taking rough fish by gigging, grabbing, snaring, and snagging shall be prescribed by the department, by regulation.
Creel limits for rough fish taken by gigging, grabbing, snaring, and snagging shall be set by the department, by regulation.

law.history: Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 178, sec. 16, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 200, sec. 61. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 78, sec. 21. -- Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 24. -- Amended 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 124, sec. 11. -- Amended 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 68, sec. 45. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 1954d-38, 1954d-42.
